name: @AutoPager - Page Break 02
description:
Modified Page Break for the AutoPager( Firefox add-on https://addons.mozilla.org/en-us/firefox/addon/4925/ )

 - Compact(small & short) text & icons
 - Thin page break

You wanna try another design? Try "Page Break 01" http://userstyles.org/styles/36639

For AutoPagerize users, see http://userstyles.org/styles/24555
additional_info:
========== Change Log ==========
Oct 23, 2016: Fixed obsolete format.
Oct 23, 2016: Removed obsolete browser-specific prefixes like -moz- and -webkit-
Sep 24, 2013: Added a comment to meet global styles criteria by Stylish described at https://github.com/JasonBarnabe/stylish/wiki/Preventing-global-styles
Dec 23, 2011: Eliminated annoying "Related Searches" block.
Mar 19, 2011: Updated for AutoPager update ;-)
Sep 05, 2010: Changed text "Auto Pagered" => "AutoPagered"
Aug 30, 2010: Added "  border-width: 0 !important;" for jump icons(top/bottom, previous/next page).
Aug 22, 2010: Added "text-decoration:none !important;" to "a:link".
Aug 20, 2010: Changed text "(Auto Pagered)" => "Auto Pagered"
